data.title: Administration
data.text:
Academic and Administrative Officers

South Plains College is organized under the leadership of Dr. Robin Satterwhite, President of the College. The College is organized into four divisions representing academic affairs, student affairs, business affairs and institutional advancement as illustrated on the College's Organizational Chart.

PRESIDENT

Robin Satterwhite, Ed.D.

rsatterwhite@southplainscollege.edu

Administration Building, (806) 716-2200
